From: Fire Fox <firefox_y2k@...>

(I have to go, so this is going to be kind of short.)

Tavatorn waited until Iron Raptor was a good distance from her before setting out. Once Iron Raptor was far enough ahead Tavatron broke into a wild sprint, her paws pounding on the soft dirt. She found herself wishing Dinobot was running beside her, she didn't know why, but she felt... safer when he was around. Tavatron shook her head mid-sprint. No time to worry about that now. Not when a 'bots life was hanging in the balance.

Tavatron slowed to a jog once the cliff came into view, looming against the darkening horizon. She blinked several times, trying to slow her racing spark:

"Maximize." 

Tavatron whispered the command, hoping Bronco would not become aware of her presence. She crouched behind a low boulder, her drill sword drawn, just in case. She was far enough away so that she shouldn't even register on her commander's scanners, but close enough so that she could keep a sharp eye on both Iron Raptor and Bronco.

Tavatron sniffed the air, something about this didn't seem right. It ahd been too easy to get here. The Alliance, the Preds, no one had interfered with them. Perhaps the uneasy truce had held, for now.
